data.title: Courteney Cox
data.text:
AKA Courteney Bass Cox

Born: 15-Jun-1964

Birthplace: Birmingham, AL

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Monica on Friends

Married David Arquette at Grace Cathedral in San Francisco.

Father: Richard Lewis Cox (divorced when Courteney was 10, d. 2001)

Mother: Courteney Bass

Brother: Richard Cox (age 45 in 2003)

Boyfriend: Michael Keaton (actor, dated 1989-95)

Boyfriend: Ian Copeland (her stepcousin and Stewart Copeland's brother)

Husband: David Arquette (dated 1996-99, m. 12-Jun-1999, sep. 2010, div. 29-May-2013, one daughter)

Daughter: Coco Riley Arquette (b. 13-Jun-2004 in Los Angeles)

Boyfriend: Johnny McDaid (musician, cohabiting since 2014)

University: Mt. Vernon College, Washington, DC

Endorsement of Coca-Cola 2003

Laser Eye Surgery 1999

In Vitro Fertilization

Miscarriage 2001

Visited Burning Man

Risk Factors: Former Smoker, Yoga, Postpartum Depression

TELEVISION

Cougar Town Jules Cobb (2009-)

Dirt Lucy Spiller (2007-08)

Friends Monica Geller Bing (1994-2004)

Family Ties Lauren Miller (1987-89)

Misfits of Science Gloria Dinallo (1985-86)
